name: Canada
interestingFact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the largest coral reef system in the world.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: Brazil is the largest country in South America.

name: Germany
interestingFact: Germany is known for its famous Oktoberfest beer festival.

name: India
interestingFact: India is the second most populous country in the world.

name: South Africa
interestingFact: South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Bloemfontein, and Cape Town.

name: France
interestingFact: France is the most visited country in the world.

name: China
interestingFact: China is the most populous country in the world.

name: Italy
interestingFact: Italy is home to the largest number of UNESCO World Heritage Sites.
